definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

sentences.english: When the Philharmonic's visit was announced, images of the Ping-Pong diplomacy of an earlier era were revived.
sentences.chinese: 當愛樂訪朝的消息公佈，早年乒乓外交的形象復甦了。

sentences.english: Are you talking about Assistant Foreign Minister Hu Zhengyue's visit to the DPRK lately?
sentences.chinese: 是不久前外交部部長助理胡正躍訪朝的活動嗎？
